Indosystem | Jakarta, INDONESIA | Full Time, Onsite

What: Web, mobile & IoT tech innovation house. We are engineering first company, focused on providing reliable, quality services. Founders and several team members have US experience.

Opening: Experienced UX designer is our priority right now. You won't only be designing responsive web & mobile app, but also user interface for consumer-facing custom hardware solution.

More about the opening: https://indosystem.com/career/visual-ux-ui-designer

Beyond that, fullstack, frontend, iOS, Android are always welcome.

To start: https://indosystem.com/career
